attributes.action: Premier League Football Free To Air
attributes.additional_details:
Calling on the government to make Premiership Football available on free to air television so that all licence fee paying citizens may enjoy our national game at its highest level unabridged.

It is unfair that most football fans have to either pay large monthly subscriptions to sky sports or watch a short highlighted version at night. If we want to inspire our countries youth to become more physically active and enthuastic about sport we need to take action now. It is strange that whilst people living all around the world can watch the premier league at little cost, many people in this country cannot afford to watch.

With the coming of the London 2012 games, we should be able to stand proud of our national sport broadcast to all.
